ModMetaData.name: [JDS] Castle Walls
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/p7Fv1Z6.gif[/img]
This mod adds Castle walls [img]https://i.imgur.com/sdod9BV.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/SvYOgbu.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/V70kd15.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/e5Kb4Rx.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/H6x7So0.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/bRWSNJV.png[/img] Q: Why are the Castle walls all separated building? A: By the nature of what i wanted, a wall that bigger then the regular one but i can't utility the walls code it all for 1x1 [h1]---------------------------------------------------[/h1] Q: Are we getting walkable parapets? A: No [h1]---------------------------------------------------[/h1] Q: Will we be able to place archer pawns on the towers and walls?? A: Right now i'm unable to do so, until i make it fully module which is not anytime soon. [h1]---------------------------------------------------[/h1] Q: CE Compatible? A: No, Find someone to patch it
